A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi left me shocked and blown away at the conclusion of the film. I sat in my seat as the credits rolled to let it all sink in. Rian Johnson has crafted a visually stunning movie and subverts your expectations. Mark Hamill\, Daisy Ridley\, and Adam Driver are the primary drivers of the plot and their portrayals are excellent. The film loses your attention with the B-plot of the Resistance but it’s achievements far outway its downfalls.
